forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.
